attributes.action: A male should also get to say if they want to keep the baby or not.
attributes.background: I realised that the law in the UK says only the women has a say. With 2019 coming soon I strongly agree in equal rights, therefore how come a male is not allowed to have a say if they want to keep the baby or not.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

You could start a new petition clearly setting out the action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
